lead_paragraph: Two days after helping the Red Sox finish off the Angels in the first round, Curt Schilling was named to start the second game of the best-of-seven series against Cleveland’s Fausto Carmona.
snippet: Two days after helping the Red Sox finish off the Angels in the first round, Curt Schilling was named to start the second game of the best-of-seven series against Cleveland’s Fausto Carmona.
